title: ACCOUNTANCY
utme_requirements:
Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language not Literature in English and Mathematics and any three (3) subjects from the following

Economics/Commerce,

Business Methods,

Principles of Accounts,

Literature in English

Geography

Office Practice

Government,

Biology/Agricultural Science,

Chemistry,

Physics,

History/Government

Typewriting

Shorthand
subjects: Mathematics and two (2) of Geography, Commerce, Government, Principles of Accounts and Economics.

title: BIOLOGY
de_requirements:
i) Two (2) 'A' Level passes from Chemistry, Biology, Botany/Zoology.

(ii) NCE merit accepted.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes to include English Language, Biology, Chemistry and Mathematics/Physics.
subjects: Biology, Chemistry and Physics or Mathematics.

title: BIOTECHNOLOGY
de_requirements: Two (2) 'A' Level passes in Biology/Botany/Zoology and Chemistry or Physics.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC Credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Biology, Chemistry and Physics.
subjects: Biology, Chemistry and any other Science subject.

title: BUSINESS ADMINISTRATION
utme_requirements:
Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, not Literature in English and Mathematics and any three (3) subjects from the following:

Economics/Commerce,

Business Methods,

Principles of Accounts,

Literature in English

Geography

Office Practice

Biology/Agricultural Science,

Chemistry,

Physics,

History/Government

Typewriting

Shorthand
subjects: Mathematics and two (2) of Geography, Commerce, Government, Principles of Accounts and Economics

title: COMPUTER ENGINEERING
utme_requirements:
Five (5) SSC credit passes in Mathematics, Physics and Chemistry and any two (2) subjects from:

Biology/Agricultural Science

Technical Drawing,

Basic Electronics/Basic Electricity,

Auto Mechanics,

Metal Work,

Woodwork (for Civil Engineering Tech.),

Further Mathematics

English Language,

Geography,

Economics/Commerce.

For Marine Engineering and Industrial Safety & Environmental Engineering a pass in Biology is required.

'O' Level credit pass in English Language is required.

title: COMPUTER SCIENCE
de_requirements:
)       Two (2) 'A' Level passes in science subjects including Mathematics

 

(ii)   NCE merit in Mathematics and one (1) other Science or Social Science subject.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes to include English Language, Mathematics, Physics plus two (2) other Science subjects.
subjects: Mathematics, Physics and one (1) of Biology, Chemistry, Agric Science, Economics and Geography.

title: COMPUTER SCIENCE
utme_requirements:
Five (5) SSC credit passes in Mathematics, a basic science and three (3) other subjects chosen from the following:

Economics,

Geography,

Government/History,

Further Mathematics,

Physics,

Chemistry,

Biology/Agricultural Science.

English Language,

Typewriting,

'O' Level credit passes in English Language and Physics is compulsory.
subjects: Mathematics and any two (2) of Geography, Physics, Economics or Chemistry.

title: ECONOMICS
de_requirements: Two (2)'A' Level passes in Economics and any one of Mathematics, Statistics, Geography, Physics, Chemistry, Agricultural Science, Accounting, Business Management, History and Government.
utme_requirements: Five (5)SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Economics and any two (2) of Arts or Social Science subjects.
subjects: Economics, Mathematics and any of Government, History, Geography, Literature in English, French and Christian Religious Studies/Islamic Studies.

title: ELECTRICAL/ELECTRONICS ENGINEERING
utme_requirements:
Five (5) 'O' Level credit passes in Mathematics, Physics and Chemistry and any two (2) subjects from:

Biology/Agricultural Science

Technical Drawing,

Basic Electronics/Basic Electricity,

Auto Mechanics,

Metal Work,

Woodwork (for Civil Engineering Tech.),

Further Mathematics

English Language,

Geography,

Economics/Commerce.

For Marine Engineering and Industrial Safety & Environmental Engineering. 'O' Level pass in Biology is required.

At least 'O' Level credit pass in English Language is required.

title: ENGLISH AND LITERARY STUDIES
de_requirements: Two (2) ‘A’ Level passes to include Literature in English and one other Arts subject.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes to include Literature in English and English Language.
subjects: Literature in English, one other Arts subject and another Arts or Social Science subject.

title: ESTATE MANAGEMENT
utme_requirements:
Five (5) 'O' Level credit passes in Mathematics, English Language, a basic science subject and any two (2) from the following:

Geography,

Economics/Commerce,

Physics,

Biology,

Chemistry,

Technical Drawing,

Fine Art,

Woodwork,

Literature,

Metal Work,

Principles of Accounts and Book Keeping

Government
subjects: Mathematics and any two (2) of Economics, Arts, Physics, Chemistry, Biology

title: INDUSTRIAL CHEMISTRY
de_requirements:
(i)    Two (2) 'A' Level passes in Chemistry and Mathematics

(ii)   ND in Science Technology or ND in relevant programmes with the UTME requirements.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Chemistry, Physics and Biology/Agricultural Science.
subjects: Chemistry, Mathematics and any of Physics/Biology/ Agricultural Science.

title: INFORMATION TECHNOLOGY
de_requirements:
Two (2) 'A' Level passes in science subjects including Mathematics

 

(ii)   NCE merit in Mathematics and one (1) other Science or Social Science subject.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes to include English Language, Mathematics, Physics plus two (2) other Science subjects.
subjects: Mathematics, Physics and one (1) of Biology, Chemistry, Agric Science, Economics and Geography.

title: MASS COMMUNICATION
de_requirements: Two (2) 'A' Level passes in Arts or Social Science subjects.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language and four (4) other subjects in Arts or Social Sciences.
subjects: Any three (3) from Arts or Social Science subjects.

title: MICROBIOLOGY
de_requirements: Two (2) 'A' Level passes in Chemistry and any one (1) from Biology, Zoology or Botany.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Chemistry, Biology and Physics.
subjects: Biology, Chemistry and either Physics or Mathematics.

title: POLITICAL SCIENCE
de_requirements: Two (2) 'A' Level passes including Government or History.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in Government or History, English Language and three (3) other subjects.  A pass in Mathematics is required.
subjects: Government or History plus two (2) other Social Science/Arts subjects.

title: SCIENCE LABORATORY TECHNOLOGY
utme_requirements:
Five (5) SSC credit passes in Mathematics and two (2) of Physics,

Biology/Agricultural Science/Health Science, Chemistry,

and two (2) other subjects from Technical Drawing, Metal or Wood Work, Basic Electricity, Geography, Further Mathematics, and Fine Arts.

'O' Level credit pass in each of the three (3) Basic Science subjects - Biology, Chemistry, Physics and a 'O' Level credit pass in English Language is compulsory.
subjects: Any three (3) of Mathematics, Biology/Agricultural Science or Physics
